events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site, but it doesn't fit at all and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The customer issue involving a refund request for a purchased jacket has been categorized under the Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in processing refunds and exchanges.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 458921. The jacket is brand new and has no damage. I just want to return it because it doesn't fit well.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the refund once you send the jacket back using the pre-paid return label I will email you shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick help. I’ll send it back as soon as I get the label.
We received the returned jacket and have processed your refund. The amount should be back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case as the refund process has been completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
